com.syclo.tool
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  com.syclo.agentry.internal.AgentryManagedObject
      com.syclo.agentry.internal.AgentryJavaBackEndManagedObject
          com.syclo.agentry.Server
              com.syclo.java.Server
                  com.syclo.tool.Server

public class Server
extends Server

This class will be the initial entry point into our Java back end. Agentry.ini's Java-[n].serverClass needs to reference the full name of this class com.syclo.tool.Server. This class will be created when the Agentry Server starts up. It is used to create a user session each time a client transmits. Notice how we override createUser to create our application's own User class, which must be a subclass of com.syclo.User
